message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business and I'm confident you'll see its worth. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe the product is a great opportunity, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
